CmdLine: rm -fr /app/* &&   apt-get update && apt-get install -yqq wget unzip php5-gd &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&   wget https://github.com/cumulus27/target-site/archive/v${VERSION}.zip &&   unzip /v${VERSION}.zip &&   rm -rf app/* &&   cp -r /target-site-${VERSION}/* /app &&   rm -rf /target-site-${VERSION} &&   cp /app/config/config.inc.php.dist /app/config/config.inc.php &&   sed -i "s/^\$_DVWA\[ 'db_user' \]     = 'root'/\$_DVWA[ 'db_user' ] = 'admin'/g" /app/config/config.inc.php &&   echo "sed -i \"s/p@ssw0rd/\$PASS/g\" /app/config/config.inc.php" >> /create_mysql_admin_user.sh &&   echo 'session.save_path = "/tmp"' >> /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini &&   sed -ri -e "s/^allow_url_include.*/allow_url_include = On/" /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini &&   chmod a+w /app/hackable/uploads &&   chmod a+w /app/external/phpids/0.6/lib/IDS/tmp/phpids_log.txt
Commands.Name: run
